stories.headline: Big Penix energy
stories.bodyText: Michael Penix took over as the Falcons’ starting quarterback late in the 2024 season after the team benched Kirk Cousins, who had struggled with turnovers and poor performance. At UW he literally turned his name into a meme-y NIL brand “Big Penix Energy” in an official collab with Seattle retailer Simply Seattle

stories.headline: Texas Longhorns Ranked #1 - Curse?
stories.bodyText: Florida State was a four-point favorite in its Week 1 game against No. 8 Miami in 1988 and lost outright — a reminder that early upsets can derail a title run. In that 1988 upset, Miami’s defense held Florida State to just 10 points, sparking Miami’s rise to a national championship that season.

stories.headline: Tswizzle and Kelce
stories.bodyText: During Taylor Swift’s Kansas City 'Eras Tour' stop in 2023, Travis Kelce tried to give her a friendship bracelet with his number, sparking fan speculation and media buzz. That failed bracelet handoff became the opening chapter of one of sports and music’s biggest crossover relationships.

stories.headline: Thumbs down for Love
stories.bodyText: Drew Brees suffered a torn thumb ligament in 2019 that required surgery, causing him to miss five games. The parallel raises concerns for Jordan Love’s availability. Brees returned from his thumb surgery throwing for over 370 yards in his first game back — a recovery Packers fans would happily take.

stories.headline: White House Brawl Stars
stories.bodyText: UFC head honcho Dana White confirmed plans to stage a Fight Night at the White House South Lawn on July 4 to celebrate the 250th birthday of the United States. Nothing screams 'America at 250' like cage fighting on government property.

stories.headline: The Stower the Better
stories.bodyText: Kyle Stowers went from a little-known outfielder to one of the season’s biggest surprises, hitting homers and making great plays in the field. Before this season, most fans couldn’t pick Stowers out of a lineup — now he’s ruining pitchers’ summers.

questions.question: What playful gesture by Travis Kelce in 2023 first connected his story to Taylor Swift in the public eye?

options.text: He dedicated a touchdown dance to her
He gave her a friendship bracelet with his phone number on it
He wore her concert merch to a press conference
